General.Name: Refrigeration Electrical Engineering Corp
General.Description: Refrigeration Electrical Engineering Corporation provides mechanical and electrical engineering services in Vietnam. The company operates through Mechanical and Refrigeration Electrical Engineering; Real Estate and Office Leasing; and Power and Water segments. It operates as mechanical and electrical engineering contractor for MVAC systems, electrical systems, ELV and BMS systems, and fire protection systems, as well as for plumbing, drainage, and sanitary systems. The company also provides shop drawing, supply, installation, testing and commissioning, as well as training, maintenance, and after sales services, as well as office building management services. In addition, it manufactures, assembles, and markets consumer and commercial air conditioners, RMV systems, replacement components, switchboards, MSB, ATS, DB, MMC, and air diffusers and air ducts, as well as AHU, FCU, and PAU under the Reetech brand. Further, the company invests in, develops, manages, and leases real estate properties comprising office buildings, information technology centers, apartments, and industrial parks. Additionally, it produces hydro, solar, and wind power;provides water supply services; and operates water treatment plants, as well as trades in electricity. The company was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
